text: The List of Sanfrecce Hiroshima players is evolving. The history of the team is created by its players. Sanfrecce Hiroshima is a Japanese professional football clubJsoccer.com, "Japan J.League Teams" ; retrieved 2012-7-5. in Hiroshima.Soccerway.com, "Sanfrecce Hiroshima"; retrieved 2012-3-8. ==List== :This list is not finished; you can help Wikipedia by adding to it. * Toshihiro Aoyama * Kota Hattori * Shinichiro Kuwada * Tadanari Lee * Tomoaki Makino * Kazuyuki Morisaki * Kōji Morisaki * Kohei Morita * Ryota Moriwaki * Hirotsugu Nakabayashi * Koji Nakajima * Shusaku Nishikawa * Hisato SatōTransfermarkt.co.uk, "Hisato Sato"; retrieved 2012-3-28. * Takashi Shimoda * Ilian Stoyanov * Yojiro Takahagi * Issei Takayanagi * Kazuyuki TodaGuardian.co.uk, Kazuyuki Toda retrieved 2012-3-20. * Satoru Yamagishi * Masato Yamazaki ===Select list of players by position === ;GK *Kazuya Maekawa ;DF *Dan Calichman *Hayden Foxe *Yūichi Komano *Ryuji Michiki *Yoshiro Moriyama *Marcus Tulio Tanaka as Brazilian. *Michel Pensée *Oleg Pashinin *Tore Pedersen *Tony Popovic *Kenichi Uemura *Hiroshige Yanagimoto ;MF *Beto *Steve Corica *Chikara FujimotoNationalFootballTeams.com, Fujimoto, Chikara; retrieved 2012-6-29. *Ivan HašekNationalFootballTeams.com, Hašek, Ivan; retrieved 2012-6-28. *Yosuke KashiwagiNationalFootballTeams.com, Kashiwagi, Yōsuke; retrieved 2012-6-28. *Yahiro KazamaNationalFootballTeams.com, Kazama, Yahiro; retrieved 2012-6-26. *Hajime MoriyasuNationalFootballTeams.com, Moriyasu, Hajime; retrieved 2012-6-25. *Noh Jung- YoonNationalFootballTeams.com, "Noh, Jung-Yoon"; retrieved 2012-6-25. *César SampaioNationalFootballTeams.com, "Sampaio, César"; retrieved 2012-6-25. ;FW *Graham Arnold *Tomislav Erceg *Tatsuhiko Kubo *Yasuyuki Moriyama *Marcelo *Serhiy Skachenko *Takuya Takagi *John van Loen *Aurelio Vidmar *Toshihiro Yamaguchi ==Related pages == * Sports in Japan * List of Japanese football teams == References == ==Other websites== * Sanfrecce Hiroshima website * J.League Club Guide Sanfrecce Hiroshima
